alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 02 at 10:02PM PDT until April 03 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...Southeastern Mendocino Interior and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County
